About Falcon

  1. Home
  2. About

Shenzhen Falcon technology Co.,ltd is a factory mainly engages in designing, developing and producing camping products such as Camping Tents, Sleeping Pads, Sleeping Bags, also we have cooperation factory for Solar panels and so on. Exported to United States. Europe, Oceania, South America, Middle East, Southeast Asia and so on.

  • 6 years professional experience in manufacturing and exporting.
  • With technicians specialize in camping products more than 20 year
  • OEM, ODM accepted.
  • 100% Strict Quality Control, with own inspecting room.
  • Fast & Cheap Delivery: We have big discount from forwarder (Long Contract) because we delivery everyday.
  • Good Service: 24 hour hot line, service more swiftly.
